ingredient-information.sestavine: Aqua, Lycium Barbarum (Goji Berry) Fruit Extract, Euterpe Oleracea (Acai) Fruit Extract, Vegetable Glycerin, Betaine, Passiflora Incarnata (Passion fruit) Fruit Extract, Hydroxyethyl Urea, Polysorbate 20, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Xanthan Gum, Propanediol, Niacinamide, Panthenol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Allantoin, Perfume, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate.

product-info.opis: Kaj je Cafe Mimi? To je ¨kul¨ kozmetična blagovna znamka z izdelki iz naravnih sestavin. Cafe Mimi izdelke odlikujejo tudi navdihujoče dišave, lepe teksture in hitri rezultati.
